00030 
00031 /*
00032  * Define types for the Type<>-System here.
00033  * There must be a streaming output available for every type used here.
00034  * template<typename charT, typename traits,typename TYPE > basic_ostream<charT, traits>& operator<<(basic_ostream<charT, traits> &out,const TYPE& s)
00035  */
00036 
00037 
00038 #define DEF_TYPE(TYPE,NAME)  \
00039     template<> const char Type<TYPE>::m_typeName[]=#NAME;
00040 
00041 DEF_TYPE( bool, boolean );
00042 
00043 DEF_TYPE( int8_t, s8bit );
00044 DEF_TYPE( uint8_t, u8bit );
00045 
00046 DEF_TYPE( int16_t, s16bit );
00047 DEF_TYPE( uint16_t, u16bit );
00048 
00049 DEF_TYPE( int32_t, s32bit );
00050 DEF_TYPE( uint32_t, u32bit );
00051 
00052 DEF_TYPE( int64_t, s64bit );
00053 DEF_TYPE( uint64_t, u64bit );
00054 
00055 DEF_TYPE( float, float );
00056 DEF_TYPE( double, double );
00057 
00058 DEF_TYPE( rgb_color24, color<u8bit> );
00059 DEF_TYPE( rgb_color48, color<u16bit> );
00060 
00061 DEF_TYPE( fvector4, fvector4 );
00062 DEF_TYPE( dvector4, dvector4 );
00063 DEF_TYPE( ivector4, ivector4 );
00064 
00065 DEF_TYPE( ilist, list<int32_t> );
00066 DEF_TYPE( dlist, list<double> );
00067 DEF_TYPE( slist, list<string> );
00068 
00069 DEF_TYPE( std::string, string );
00070 DEF_TYPE( Selection, selection );
00071 DEF_TYPE( boost::posix_time::ptime, timestamp );
00072 DEF_TYPE( boost::gregorian::date, date );
00073 
00074 namespace _internal
00075 {
00076 struct type_lister {
00077     std::map< unsigned short, std::string > &m_map;
00078     bool m_withTypes, m_withTypePtrs;
00079     type_lister( std::map< unsigned short, std::string > &map, bool withTypes, bool withTypePtrs ): m_map( map ), m_withTypes( withTypes ), m_withTypePtrs( withTypePtrs ) {}
00080     template<typename SRC> void operator()( SRC ) {//will be called by the mpl::for_each
00081         if( m_withTypes )m_map.insert( std::make_pair( Type<SRC>::staticID, Type<SRC>::staticName() ) );
00082 
00083         if( m_withTypePtrs )m_map.insert( std::make_pair( data::TypePtr<SRC>::staticID, data::TypePtr<SRC>::staticName() ) );
00084     }
00085 };
00086 
00087 }
00088 
00089 std::map< unsigned short, std::string > getTypeMap( bool withTypes, bool withTypePtrs )
00090 {
00091     std::map< unsigned short, std::string > ret;
00092     boost::mpl::for_each<_internal::types>( _internal::type_lister( ret, withTypes, withTypePtrs ) );
00093     return ret;
00094 }
00095 
00096 std::map< std::string, unsigned short > getTransposedTypeMap( bool withTypes, bool withTypePtrs )
00097 {
00098     typedef std::map< std::string, unsigned short> transposedMapType;
00099     typedef std::map< unsigned short, std::string > mapType;
00100     transposedMapType ret;
00101     BOOST_FOREACH( mapType::const_reference ref, util::getTypeMap( withTypes, withTypePtrs ) ) {
00102         ret[ref.second] = ref.first;
00103     }
00104     return ret;
00105 }
00106 
00107 }
00108 }
